content.title: Oh, hey.
content.text:
You may know me as Jen, but on the internet I'm more commonly known as **cuibonobo**. (It's a name I [made up](/articles/the-artist-formerly-known-as-jen-montes/).)

This site is still in active development and I've been [using it and building it at the same time](https://github.com/cuibonobo/cuibonobo.com), but you can learn more [about me](/about), read some of [my writing](/articles), or check out my [random thoughts](/ephemera/).

Most of my open-source work is on [GitHub](https://github.com/cuibonobo) and my most-used social media platform is [Twitter](https://twitter.com/cuibonobo), but I've been trying to wean myself off of it.

**Jennifer Garcia** is an artist, engineer, and organizer. Through her work she has [put things in space](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GOES_15), drawn characters for [an Emmy-winning show](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archer_(2009_TV_series)), and been in the trenches of [struggle for worker power](https://www.cartoonbrew.com/artist-rights/workers-at-atlantas-floyd-county-productions-the-studio-behind-archer-move-to-unionize-202857.html). For most of her life she was conflicted about how to apply her talents, but it was through union organizing that she finally found direction. She's now working with several organizations to help people come into their voice and realize their power. Those efforts will hopefully come to fruition over the coming weeks, months, and years. Jen is from Puerto Rico and lives [ITP of Atlanta](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interstate_285_(Georgia)) with a loving partner and a good dog. ### This Site Development is still [underway](https://github.com/cuibonobo/cuibonobo.com), but this is a statically-generated [Svelte](https://svelte.dev/) site that is hosted on [CloudFlare](https://pages.cloudflare.com/). ### Contact
